document_data.mainbody: ow is a list of [[Dungeons & Dragons]]: [[Forgotten Realms]] [[:Category:Storylines|storylines]] and their associated novels.
document_data.4th Edition:
;[[Abyssal Plague]] (2010–2012)
Associated novels: 
:*''[[Sword of the Gods]]''
:*''[[Shadowbane]]''

;[[Rise of the Underdark]] (2012)

document_data.5th Edition:

:*[[The Sundering (series)|The Sundering series]]

;[[Elemental Evil]] (2015)
:Associated novels: None

;[[Rage of Demons]] (2015–2016)

document_data.Further reading:
The current D&D storyline is posted at [http://dnd.wizards.com/dungeons-and-dragons/story Wizards.com].
